title: Still no Ivern, Lucian, or Ahri nerfs on the PBE

replies.body: Its beyond me how Riot still hasn't nerfed Ahri for the past 4 years for how ridiculous she is, meanwhile they nerf other champions secretly without us knowing....

I'm amazed that a comment like this comes from a person with the name "Popstar Ahri" and an Ahri profile picture. 

I guess not all Ahri mains are quite the same.

> [{quoted}](name=Marshbouy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=6BIcw9EV,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-04-04T01:22:13.548+0000)
>
> I'm amazed that a comment like this comes from a person with the name "Popstar Ahri" and an Ahri profile picture. 
> 
> I guess not all Ahri mains are quite the same.

That's because he spent 3 years playing other champions so people wouldn't bash him for playing Ahri.

She has not needed nerfs those years because others outshined her. She's only strong now because of the nerfs to other champions.

Except this isn't even true. 
She is by FAR the best midlaner for YEARS. 
Just because others were op like syndra or viktor doesn't mean she was totally fine. 
But fact is ahri has ALWAYS been a safe and reliable pick also covered by statistic FACTS. 
People just realise it now that her whole competition has been nerfed into the ground compared to her. 
I played Ahri a few  games just for the lulz and it is DISGUSTING how she just doesn't have any losing matchups. You can pick her into ANYTHING and do fine-great with no drawbacks whatsoever EXCEPT her lack of dmg against really tanky targets in the later stages of the game despite her true dmg. 
She's an assassin after all and not a mage like riot wanted her to be.
When was Viktor OP? He's never broken Solo Q, just had a high pick rate.

He just wants her nerfed so he can actually pick her again with no contest, 

Long as they don't touch her damage and charm duration i really don't care what they do.

> [{quoted}](name=Popstar Ahri,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=6BIcw9EV,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-04-04T01:18:09.219+0000)
>
> Its beyond me how Riot still hasn't nerfed Ahri for the past 4 years for how ridiculous she is, meanwhile they nerf other champions secretly without us knowing....

Funny, she's been nerfed 3x since 2 years ago.

> [{quoted}](name=Popstar Ahri,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=6BIcw9EV,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-04-04T01:18:09.219+0000)
>
> Its beyond me how Riot still hasn't nerfed Ahri for the past 4 years for how ridiculous she is, meanwhile they nerf other champions secretly without us knowing....

Personally, I think one of the major overbearing parts of her kit is the movespeed on her Q. If it was only granted if it hit a champion, I would have less problems with it. But it rewards you for MISSING your Q. That feels way too forgiving.

> [{quoted}](name=Popstar Ahri,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=6BIcw9EV,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-04-04T01:18:09.219+0000)
>
> Its beyond me how Riot still hasn't nerfed Ahri for the past 4 years for how ridiculous she is, meanwhile they nerf other champions secretly without us knowing....

*looks at your name*
Lucian doesn't need a nerf.  He was garbage tier until the BoRK changes.  They need to adjust BoRK again.

So basically because ONE champ once again is way too strong with said item the ITEM needs to be nerfed once again for the rest of the competition? 
Hell yeah, let's continue the bullshit cycle.

Lucian is indeed overtuned due to botrk abuse. 

Ahri might use a slight nerf, i agree.

Ivern is surely overperforming, but he might be tricky to balance, because of how well concealed his power is.

bc they don't need it? ivern might need an increase on daisy's cd, but lucian is barely stronger than the other ad options, and im sorry, but you just can't convince me that ahri is op/broken/busted and in need of nerfs.

Nothing actually get's put on the PBE until the new patch roles out. (Though Riot is still doing stuff internally) 

Come back after Wendsday or so, when the new patch comes.
{{champion:236}} can have some time to shine
because the PBE cycle is already wrapped up and the patch is going to ship on Wednesday
The skins are coming.
dammit you beat me
Any aatrox, urgot, or azir buffs?
Because they dont really need nerfs, the bandwagon is just shitposting without looking at stats and using their heads.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=6BIcw9EV,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-04-04T01:21:06.354+0000)
>
> Because they dont really need nerfs, the bandwagon is just shitposting without looking at stats and using their heads.

Ivern has been number 1 win rate champion in over 5 patch? the first patch doesn't count since people were learning him but ever since his release he has been 1st no matter what, 2nd to him was Shaco the B.S jungler.
